rate janadhipathi warayama wishwa widyala adhyapanayak nolabu ayek nam, ohugema puthraya nithi widyalaye horata wibhagaya samath wu ayek nam, shri lanka krikat kanadayamata thamage piya deshapalanagnyayek wu paliyata athulu wimata hakinam, merata thanapathi sewayata gota bappilage dula hewath hondama wargaye pudgalika pandam karayo nohoth rate pawata bihiwana shapakari minisun path wanne nam mema wishwa widyala walata theruna wu nawa yowun wiye asarana sisunta dena nayakathwa puhunuwa mona kengediyakatada?
